Posts.EditableText:
This is a sci-fi mystery game, actually a chapter 2 of three chapters. It is good enough, though, to play as a stand-alone game. I made it for a class, a few years ago, but some of the puzzle parts were deleted before I lost the game source! I recreated the game source and made every last activity 
actually 
completable. 
(Never let grammar auto-correct applications control your writing)
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/0r4mfmw5hueigxmaaqd3iw/an-antikythera-lunar-new-year

This is a sci-fi mystery game, actually a chapter 2 of three chapters. It is good enough, though, to play as a stand-alone game. I made it for a class, a few years ago, but some of the puzzle parts were deleted before I lost the game source! I recreated the game source and made every last activity
actually
completable.
(Never let grammar auto-correct applications control your writing)
